Keywords: Brotherhood of Mutants , Celebrity , Hellfire Club , Martial Artist , Warp World , X-Men
Real Name: Frost
Special Powers
DEEP WOUNDS FOR DEEPER SECRETS: When Diamond Patch hits a single opposing character with a close attack, after resolutions he can use Mind Control as FREE, but only to target the hit character.
DIAMONDS ARE FOREVER: Invulnerability. Diamond Patch can reduce penetrating damage. // At the beginning of your turn, heal 1 click.
I CAN SMELL WHO YOU ARE: Opposing characters within 6 squares can't use the following: Shape Change; Stealth; Keywords that are not printed on their cards.

Comments
January 10, 2022
tidge
I want to congratulate the (new) design team for remembering in the (new) 2021 rules that :bolt::bolt: is a thing in close combat, but none of the attack powers, nor the DEEP WOUNDS trait benefit from multiple targets... with the possible exception of Steal Energy should you miss one but hit the second target. This is a stronger defensive figure than offensive IMO. If you want the tricks, the lower point cost may be the figure you want to use.
September 2, 2021
Redrover454
With traited Invuln that can reduce pen damage this guy functionally has a full dial of invincible. Combine that with SS, auto-heal, X-Men TA, and Flurry/Steal energy and you have a pretty hard to KO 80pts. Just watch out for Outwit!
August 12, 2021
Goop
You get a free mc after a hit, honestly i'd rather just have a flurry. His defense is really nice though, you can't penetrate him and he has SS too. His big thing is that there is no shape change or stealth within SIX squares. That is a big area to cover. With the heal every turn he's probably one of the better chases in the set.
August 1, 2021
vamroc
Something I'd like to point out is "I can smell who you are" completely ignores terrain so even it can be outwitted that's pretty hard to do behind Barrier, Elevated, or Blocking terrain in general. Personally I'd give him Stealth so that way to Outwit him you've got to base him which is pretty a death sentence for anyone who does
July 19, 2021
Dortmuner
Six squares is a huge area of effect for that kind of power. It's a shame it's Outwittable. I'd still consider adding him to my Ultimate Knullifiers. Not sure if I'd go Wonder Woman bracelets for a 50/50 SS or Power Gem so he's swinging with 13s and 12s for BCF and MC. Course if you go Power Gem, he's better off not using BCF on the first two clicks and just using the tasty five damage outright.
July 19, 2021
Dioneo
Skrull hunter extraordinaire.
